entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MapAssets System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: (Parameter 'offset') Actual value was 0. #56371
  • [API Proposal]: Add new constructor for `HttpValidationProblemDetails` that accepts a `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>` #56370
  • Enable case-insensitive route parameter binding for enums #56369
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56366
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #56365
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_spring, mapaction #56364
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56363
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes, fortunes #56362
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, single_query #56361
  • 406 Not Accepted when returning ObjectResult with content type 'application/json; charset=utf-8' #56357
  • Perf regression: mvc #56356

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56355
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56139
  • Security concern with accessing server-side Blazor services from a different DI scope / semaphore needed? #56341
  • Perf improvement: https, json #56347

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up nullability and primitive type handing in schema generation #56372
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Remove incorrect suppressions from AwaitableInfo #56360
    area-mvc

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as switch instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
